title.rendered: Steal Amazon Market Share with PPC with Brian Johnson of Canopy Management

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 31:20 — 28.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 31:20 — 28.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Sometimes you leave the door wide open for all your rival

Ultimately, we want to defend our real-estate

If a shopper makes it to our product page, we don’t want to lose them to competitors. 

So it’s better to defend some of that real estate/air space.

 

Today, Brian Johnson from Canopy Management will share his thoughts about defending and stealing the Amazon market.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • How to defend your product through “air space”
  • How to steal market share through the listing
  • Understanding Amazon Ad Options
  • The importance of identifying complementary products
